runs.comm: Full, outside off and Gilchrist drives - times it sweetly- and Rohit Sharma dives to his left at cover to make a fine stop. The crowd roar their approval

Streaky edge between the 'keeper and slip! Full in length and well outside off stump, Gilchrist frees his arms and has a slash and the ball races between Dhoni and Sehwag who is standing slightly wide

The white ball has begun to fly already. Again room outside off and Gilchrist throws the kitchen sink at it. A feisty slash and the ball flies over point. The fine leg comes up inside the circle and there is a deep point
Ah! and where does this one go. To the fine leg boundary. Short in length, on the middle and leg and Gilly swivels off the front foot to pull it past the short fine-leg fielder. What a start

Two fours and then he is cleaned up. The middle stump has gone for a walk. A screaming yorker, on the middle stump line and Gilchrist plays all around it. RP is pumped up and Gilchrist walks back to the hutch. Frenetic start to this Twenty20 showdown.
beaten. In the zone outside off stump, off a length, Ponting has a lazy push at it but inside the line and the ball teases the outside edge.
beaten. Some posthumous swing there. The length delivery outside off stump and Hayden stabs inside the line and the ball swings after it passes the stumps. Hence posthumous.
fuller, closer to the off stump and Hayden gets on to the front foot to drive to mid-off.
on the stumps, shaping in after landing on a length around middle and off line, Hayden drives on the up but the inward movement the ball went off the inner half of the bat towards square leg.
back to the corridor outside off stump, moving away with the angle and Hayden allows Dhoni come into play. Four dot balls so far. Will Hayden impose himself now?
One way of not allowing him to impose himself is to bowl a wide. Way outside off, first bad delivery of the over
again well outside off, Hayden shoulders arms and looks at the umpire with hope. Nope, its not a wide. Just on the border line.

again outside off stump, full in length, Hayden tries to drive but the ball was getting away from him and his bat-handle rotates and he ends up mistiming it to right of Sreesanth. End of a tight over from Sreesanth.

edged to third man boundary. Really wide outside off stump, Ponting stretched across and went for a square drive and got a bottom edge wide of the slip fielder. It would have been called a wide had he left it.
closer to the off and driven to mid-off
better, on a length, around the off stump and Ponting comes forward to push it towards mid-on.
another length delivery, angling away from Ponting who lunges forward, as his wont, and pushes it to cover. Robin fires in a direct hit at the striker's end but Ponting is inside the crease.
Classy shot on the up. Short of length delivery on the off stump, Ponting leans forward and knives it on the up over mid-on. Fab strike.
A sharp bouncer and Ponting is surprised, is late on the pull and top edges it to long leg boundary.

The bat broke! Short in length, outside off stump, Hayden tries to pull it off the front foot, rather flat-bat it straight, and the ball crashes into the bottom half of the bat and there is a chip of the bat flying to the off side. Broke bat mountain. Err... sorry couldn't resist it.
Creamed through wide mid-off. Full in length, outside off and Hayden thrashes it to right of mid-off
that imperious Haydos walk down the track. And he had a heave across the line to a length delivery but can't connect

well outside off stump, on a length, Hayden again tries to hit on the up and straight and since the ball was slightly wider, he ended up mistiming it to mid-off. He would be better off creaming it through the off side.

Massive. Banged in short and Hayden pulls off the front foot over long-leg boundary. It flew deep into the stands. He had got on to the front foot - you could see why Sreesanth bowled the short one - but was quick to swivel around to cream it.
length delivery, just outside off stump, punched to the off side
Full and outside off, Ponting is beaten, trying to go for an expansive cover drive
on a length, around off stump, pushed to point
another sharp bouncer and it curved in, cramping Ponting who adjusts by arching back and taking the bottom-hand off the handle before steering it to third man
fullish, just short of the yorker length, on the middle stump line and Hayden drives straight back at RP who makes a half-stop and the ball rolls to hit the sticks at the non-striker's end
Hayden goes downtown. Full pitched, on the off and middle and Hayden leans forward to smoke it over the long-off boundary. Clean hit.
yorker on the middle line, Hayden jabs at it and gets a inside edge on to the front boot and the ball rolls away to the off side.
short in length outside off stump and Ponting rocks back to square cut it past backward point. RP Singh gets across from the wide third man position and throws in a dive but is slow in doing so
edged to third man boundary. Full and outside off, Ponting drives and gets a thick outside edge to the third man boundary
slow off cutter, on the middle and off stump line, driven to midwicket
Third one of the over. Runs are coming in a flood here. Full pitched, outside off stump and Ponting plays a lovely off drive to the right of mid-off

Another one. The fourth of the over. Australia are off to a blazing start. Ponting charges out, Pathan hurls it wider outside off but Ponting adjusts by lunging across to scoop it over cover. Few bounces and over the ropes. What a ballistic start to the game.
flighted delivery outside off stump, Hayden leans forward to guide it to backward point
ah! tries to reverse sweep before he changes his mind. Rather Harbhajan makes him change tack by floating it outside leg stump and Hayden nudges it behind square leg
on the middle and off, top edges a paddle sweep to short fine leg region
full and on the middle stump line, turning in, driven to long-on for a single
fuller, almost on the yorker length, on the off and middle, jabbed away to cover
dragged on! The chinese cut goes awry. Full and outside off stump, Hayden tries to thrash it through cover but the bat comes outside the line and he gets a fatal inside edge. Hard luck.
flighted from round the stumps, on the off and middle, driven to long-off
beaten in the flight. Landed on a length, around the middle stump and spun away, Symonds leans forward, is beaten in the flight before nudging it to cover point
gets off the strike with a drive to long on
leans forward to place the ball to cover point
slipping to the leg side and Ponting plays a cute paddle shot to the fine-leg boundary. The dancers are up doing their job.
arm-ball and Ponting is beaten. It came in with the arm, on the middle and off line,  Ponting tries to play a late-cut and gets a inside edge to the on side.
goes back to work it with the turn to square leg for a single
threatens to come out and Harbhajan drags back the length and Symonds taps it to the on side
comes out this time, to the pitch of a flighted delivery and drives to long-off
on the off and middle, full and Ponting drives to long-on for another single.
flights full and on the leg and middle stump line, Symonds takes it on the full and turns it quietly to long leg.
full, just short of the blockhole and Ponting picks up a single with a drive to long-on.
Repeats the delivery he bowled last. An arm-ball. Ponting plays it carefully into the gap at cover point for a single
worked past midwicket for another single
slower in the air, again comes on straight with the arm, Ponting waits on the ball before turning it past midwicket
quicker, shorter as he sees Symonds threatening to come out and pushed to the off side
slower and fuller, outside leg stump, Symonds eases it to wide long-on region
dealing largely in arm-balls. Another one on the middle, a tad quick and Symonds gets his bat in front of the pad and works it behind square leg
slow off cutter, outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
120.01 kmph, another slow off cutter, full and on the midde, driven uppishly to long-on
138.2, full length delivery, outside off stump, driven to long-off for a single
back to the off cutter, on the middle and driven to long-on for a single
another slow off cutter, 119 k, spins away after landing on a length around middle and off, Ponting leans forward to push it wide of extra cover
118 k, on a length, around the off stump, pushed to cover point and will retain the strike. Pathan has been concentrating on taking the pace off the ball and Murali Kartik is focusing on arm-balls
another arm-ball, just outside off stump and Symonds is struck on the pad and stifled appeal goes up. Struck outside off stump
this one turns away and it beats the forward prod and Ponting picks up a leg bye
charges out and lofts over the infield on the off side. He didn't quite reach the pitch , was beaten in the flight but went through with the shot
full and around off stump, driven hard but Yuvraj Singh dives at extra cover to make a smart stop
he has started to mix things up nicely. This one spins away sharply and past the outside edge as Ponting stabbed at it
full in length, straight, on the middle and off, Symonds backed away a touch and cut it hard but straight to Yuvraj at point.
Fab stop from Yuvraj. A tad short in length and Symonds cuts to right of Yuvraj who dives to make a half-stop

dropped by Dhoni. . Full in length and outside off stump, Ponting goes for a slash across the line - a pull shot off the front foot - and got a thick edge. It was travelling at some speed and Dhoni sprang to his right but ended up palming it over.
short in length and Ponting unfurls a neat pull shot. Four more
skies a pull but its in the gap. Another shortish delivery and Ponting goes for a pull and the ball soars high in the air towards wide midwicket region
full in length, on the off stump line, driven through mid-off for a single

what drama. Ponting almost gives a return catch off a leading edge and as it turns out it is Symonds who is run out. It was floated in the air, full and it curved away at the last minute, Ponting tried to play across the line and got a leading edge. The ball lobbed up towards say .. short cover and Harbhajan couldn't reach it. Huge hesitation as Ponting sets off for a run before stopping and again proceeding before stopping again! Symonds was sold a dummy and couldn't get back to the non-striker's end. Harbhajan Singh threw the ball to Yuvraj who takes the bails off. Chaos.
leans forward to drive through the on side
pushes to extra cover for a quick single
flighted one, slower in the air and it spins in to evade to forward prod and strikes him on the pad
flighted full into the blockhole, jabbed back down the track
full and around the off stump, driven to the off side
115.5 kmph, slow off cutter, fullish, Hodge is early into the drive and hits it back to Pathan who dives forward and to his right to make the stop
Full and outside off stump, carved to right of sweeper cover

appeal for stumping. Full in length, on the middle and off and it slants away. Ponting is beaten, going for a pull and Dhoni takes the bails off in a flash. Ponting's back foot is planted inside the crease.
back to the slow off cutter. Full and outside off, driven to long-off for a single

The middle stump has been pegged back and settles into Dhoni's gloves. Length delivery, no slow off cutter this time, and Hodge goes for a pull but misses it completely. Gone. Hodge's nightmarish tour ends.
pushes forward, the ball hits the pad and rolls to the on side
tossed-up, on a length, on the off and middle and it spins away, Clarke drives and gets a outside edge through backward point
arm-ball, full and homing in on the off stump, Clarke backs away to cut it past point
comes out of the crease and Kartik fired it in shorter and Ponting is struck on the pad
ripper. It landed on a length, on the middle and off stump, Ponting is caught at the crease, tries to cut it to the off side and the ball spins past the bat and just over the off stump.
on the middle and leg, tries to sweep but it bounces more than he expects and is struck on the pad. Impressive over comes to an end
short in length, spinning in from outside off, Clarke is on the front foot and turns it to midwicket
slower, on the middle stump line, turning in, swept past square leg
hurls it full, on the yorker length, turned away past square leg. Sreesanth, running in from long leg, fumbles and they complete the second run
again full, on the yorker length, Clarke takes it on the full and turns it to deep midwicket
full again, Clarke comes out, almost yorks himself in the process and jabs it through mid-on
good ol' lemon cut. Full in length, on the stumps, Clarke goes for a on-the-up drive and ends up nicking it past the leg stump
length delivery on the middle and leg, Clarke stays adjacent to the line and gets a outside edge to backward point
Leans forward to pull it off the front foot, the ball flies off the inner-half of the bat and Harbhajan makes a sliding stop near the ropes but the right foot had touched the ropes.
full in length, outside off, driven to long-off
another length delivery outside off, driven on the up, through the line towards long-off where Robin fumbles and gives away an extra run
banged in short and it sails well above Ponting's head. Both Ponting and Dhoni can't reach it
fab off drive. Fullish, on the off stump line and Ponting leans into his drive and pings the wide long-on boundary. Caressed away. No violence. Classy.
off cutter, on the off stump line, Clarke forces it through cover region and Rohit Sharma, coming across from sweeper cover, makes a awful fumble and gives away a boundary.
yorker, on the off stump line, jabbed away through mid-off
again full, on the off stump line, Ponting goes for a off drive and makes contact with the inner half of the bat and the ball rolls away to midwicket
slow off cutter, spinning in from middle and leg, turned past square leg
full in length, on the stumps, Ponting takes out the front leg off the line and hits it to right of Uthappa at long-on
Another batsman drags it on. Full in length, on the off and middle, angling away, Ponting goes for a ambitious pull and gets a fatal inside edge.
yorker to start off the last over, pushed to extra cover. Five balls to go.
Dot ball. full in length, outside off stump, Haddin goes for a big heave across the line but no wood on leather though.

appeal for a catch behind and umpire Saheba calls it a wide. ah! Way outside off stump, Haddin tries to reach it and gets a edge but the umpire didn't pick it. RP can't believe it and you can guess what hindi expletive he would have uttered...!
full in length, outside off stump, driven to wide long-off for couple of runs
And again. Another full delivery and Haddin pings the wide long-off region
full in length, on the off stump line, driven to long-off for a single
yorker, just outside off stump, Clarke can only stab at it and picks up a single to cover region. Good tight over from RP and Australia end up on 166.
